mapper.select:
select FACTORY as factory, PLACE as place, EQUIPMENT as equipment, TEMPERATURE as temperature, HUMIDITY as humidity, CLEANLINESS as cleanliness,
TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'mi') || ':' || case when To_number(TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'ss'))<15 then '00' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'ss'))<30 then '15' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'ss'))<45 then '30'
else '45' end as secondDate from HUMITUREDATA WHERE
FACTORY=#{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
GROUP BY FACTORY,PLACE,EQUIPMENT,TEMPERATURE,HUMIDITY,CLEANLINESS,DATADATE
